alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:06PM EDT until July 23 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Wayne County in east central Indiana... Northern Fayette County in east central Indiana... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 504 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just west of Dublin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Richmond, Connersville, Centerville, Cambridge City, Hagerstown, Dublin, Waterloo, Greens Fork, East Germantown, Mount Auburn, Mettel Field, Jacksonburg, Interstate 70 at Exit 145, Bentonville and Beesons. This includes I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 148. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
